price: Mo Wura Nyankopͻn no na Ɔma nsuo mu hyεn kͻ yͻͻ mamo wͻ ͻpo so sεdeε mode bεhwehwε N’adom. Nokorε sε Onyankopͻn hu mo mmͻbͻ.
arabic: رَّبُّكُمُ ٱلَّذِي يُزۡجِي لَكُمُ ٱلۡفُلۡكَ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ لِتَبۡتَغُواْ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ بِكُمۡ رَحِيمٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: rabbukumu alladhī yuz'jī lakumu al-ful'ka fī al-baḥri litabtaghū min faḍlihi innahu kāna bikum raḥīman
